name: Alpha Neon Fighter (Playmaker Gamejam 03-2018 )
description:
Neon fighter is a short score attack bullet hell made for the Playmaker March 2018 Gamejam.

The theme used was Last Resort, translated as the skill that can be used by pressing the Space key. It works like a screen clear of sorts that halves your score.

Done in less than 72 hours.

Assets used:
